0.name: Mayor Goodman
0.text: Citizen, I know you'd like to help your town.

2.name: Mayor Goodman
2.text: A child has strayed into the [color]cemetery to the south of town[/color].

7.name: Mayor Goodman
7.text: Oh!? You'll go there and save her?

8.name: Mayor Goodman
8.text: Return her to me alive, and surely I'll be a hero...

9.name: Mayor Goodman
9.text: Er, umh, I mean... You'll be a hero!

10.name: Mayor Goodman
10.text: How could you do this to me?!
